TC-001.Title: Verify SGP Generator Full Responsiveness on Desktop
TC-001.Preconditions: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible via a supported desktop browser.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly at all common desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a desktop web browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Edge).
Steps.Step Expected Result: The application loads successfully without layout issues.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly at all common desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Resize the browser window to various widths (e.g., 1920px, 1366px, 1024px, 800px, 600px).
Steps.Step Expected Result: The layout and content adapt fluidly to each width, maintaining usability and readability.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly at all common desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Interact with all primary features (e.g., navigation, form inputs, buttons) at each width.
Steps.Step Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional at all tested widths.

TC-002.Title: Verify SGP Generator Full Responsiveness on Mobile Devices (iOS and Android)
TC-002.Preconditions: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible via a supported mobile browser.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on both iOS and Android devices in all orientations.
Steps.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a mobile browser (Safari for iOS, Chrome for Android).
Steps.Step Expected Result: The application loads successfully without layout issues.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on both iOS and Android devices in all orientations.
Steps.Step Description: Rotate the device between portrait and landscape orientations.
Steps.Step Expected Result: The layout and content adapt fluidly to both orientations, maintaining usability and readability.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on both iOS and Android devices in all orientations.
Steps.Step Description: Interact with all primary features (e.g., navigation, form inputs, buttons) in both orientations.
Steps.Step Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional in both orientations.

TC-003.Title: Verify SGP Generator Responsiveness on Tablet Devices
TC-003.Preconditions: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible via a supported tablet browser.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on tablet devices in all orientations.

Steps.Step Expected Result: The application loads successfully without layout issues.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on tablet devices in all orientations.

Steps.Step Expected Result: The layout and content adapt fluidly to both orientations, maintaining usability and readability.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on tablet devices in all orientations.
Steps.Step Description: Interact with all primary features (e.g., navigation, form inputs, buttons) in both orientations.
Steps.Step Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional in both orientations.

TC-004.Title: Verify SGP Generator Layout and Functionality on Edge Case Screen Sizes
TC-004.Preconditions: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible. Browser or emulator supports custom screen sizes.
TC-004.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only edge case screen sizes.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly at edge case screen sizes.

TC-005.Title: Verify No Horizontal Scrollbar Appears at Any Supported Resolution
